s1.message: The focus of Adblock Plus 1.2.2 is improving compatibility with Firefox 4, the following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.2.1. If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s2.message: Updated for asynchronous redirect API in Firefox 4 Beta 4 (bug 546606)

s3.message: Stopped using tag for context menus which is transparent in Firefox 4 Beta 3 (bug 578322) — not entirely fixed, still and issue for the toolbar icon context menu

s4.message: Stopped using nsIDOMNSHTMLAnchorElement interface which no longer exists in Firefox 4 Beta 4 (bug 582303)

s5.message: Subscription dialog: Made "Add a different subscription" button less prominent by turning it into a link

s6.message: Subscription dialog: Fixed bad Chinese translation for the "Add a different subscription" button
